column2: Bina Staraya and Biny Selo) is a settlement and municipality in Baku
column3: Azerbaijan.  It has a population of 26
column4: 395. It is the nearest urban area to Baku Airport and was once home to one of the biggest markets in the country till that was moved to a location at the southernmost edge of Baku
column5: near Lökbatan. The new market retains the name Binə Bazaar despite its lost geographical relevance.
